mapper.insert: insert into Sigungu(city_no, sigun_name, gu_name, sido_num) values(sigungu_seq.nextval, #{sigunName}, #{guName}, #{sidoNum})
mapper.select: SELECT city_no as "no", sigun_name as "sigunName", gu_name as "guName", sido_num as "sidoNum" FROM Sigungu
SELECT city_no as "no", sigun_name as "sigunName", gu_name as "guName", sido_num as "sidoNum" FROM Sigungu WHERE city_no = #{vlaue}
SELECT city_no as "no", sigun_name as "sigunName", gu_name as "guName" FROM Sigungu WHERE sido_num = #{value}
